channel.title: Online Community for Graduate Students on UH Pol Sci
channel.description: Recent content in Online Community for Graduate Students on UH Pol Sci

item.title: How to build a professional personal website in 20 minutes?
item.description: This post aims to provide a tutorial on building a professional personal website in a cost-effective way.

item.title: How to make an exam with an existing test bank on Blackboard?
item.description: This article details how to use Blackboard to make an exam.

item.title: I got a job!
item.description: This post is aimed to share someone's experience of getting a job in the hope of helping other fellow students.

item.title: Share your thoughts on this website
item.description: This post provides a guide on how to share thoughts on the website. The website would not be possible without the generous sharing of our professors and fellow students. We hope everyone could benefit from the materials, and we look forward to learning from you.

item.title: There is an opportunity!
item.description: Hi guys, Harvard has an open position. Anyone interested?

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: How to upload Rich Content (e.g. videos) to the website?
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Happy Birthday Chords
item.description: Happy ABirthday Eto youHappy EBirthday Ato youHappy A7Birthday dear DJohnnyHappy ABirthday Eto Ayou

item.title: About Author
item.description: I am John Doe. And I can confirm that this is the best theme ever!
